author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
105-year-old

die of burns

N. Semalaiappa Gounder (105) of Salaiputhur, near Chenjeriputhur village in Sulur taluk, died of burns injuries on Sunday. The police said that his dhoti caught fire from a lamp when he fell in bathroom. He died at Coimbatore Medical College Hospital.

Body found

The body of an unidentified man was found floating in Valankulam on Tuesday morning. The body was found close to the new scheme road connecting Trichy Road and Ukkadam Bypass Road.
title: Crime Notes (Two Items)
